next_steps: Immediately reach out to the customer to re-engage, understand their current needs, and address any concerns that have led to decreased activity.

Conduct a thorough competitive analysis to identify the competitor's strengths and weaknesses, and develop a strategy to differentiate Schneider Electric's offering and mitigate the competition's engagement.

Develop a concise, value-driven proposal highlighting the long-term benefits and ROI of Schneider Electric's solution, focusing on areas where our contract performance has historically exceeded expectations.
